enWisdom: Disagreement is the motive for wars
Organized affairs are disrupted by disagreement
Remain with the community and eschew separation

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْفُرْقَةَ فَإِنَّ الشَّاذَّ مِنَ النَّاسِ لِلشَّيْطَانِ
enWisdom: Beware of separation [from the people], for indeed the one who is isolated from the people is [a target] for Satan

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْفُرْقَةَ فَإِنَّ الشَّاذَّ عَنْ أَهْلِ الْحَقِّ لِلشَّيْطَانِ كَمَا أَنَّ الشَّاذَّ مِنَ الْغَنَمِ لِلذِّئْبِ
enWisdom: Beware of separation, for indeed the one who is isolated from the people of truth is [prey] for Satan just as the lonely sheep is [prey] for the wolf

Wisdom: إِيَّاكُمْ وَالتَّدَابُرَ وَالتَّقَاطُعَ وَتَرْكَ الْأَمْرِ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَالنَّهْيَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ
enWisdom: Be careful to keep away from turning your backs on each other, cutting off ties with each other, and abandoning the enjoining of good and prohibiting of evil [with respect to one another]
The cause of disunity is disagreement

Wisdom: عَرِّجُوا عَنْ طَرِيقِ الْمُنَافَرَةِ وَضَعُوا تِيجَانَ الْمُفَاخَرَةِ
enWisdom: Turn away from the path of mutual aversion and abandon the crowns of boastfulness

Wisdom: مِنْ نَكَدِ الدُّنْيَا تَنْغِيصُ الِاجْتِمَاعِ بِالْفُرْقَةِ وَالسُّرُورِ بِالْغُصَّةِ
enWisdom: One of the troubles of this world is the spoiling of union by separation and happiness by distress
